videos.title: The Give Water Project Documentary
videos.description: The Give Water Project is a gospel-centered initiative that serves various unreached villages around India and Nepal to provide clean drinking water through the construction of water wells.  This effort protects marginalized, low-caste people groups from water-borne illnesses and restores their hope in the name of Jesus.  This initiative creates opportunities to plant churches and make disciples of Jesus Christ in these remote areas. I had the privilege of traveling to many of these villages, speaking with individuals who have been both physically and spiritually impacted from these water wells, recording their testimonies, and creating this documentary to share how this ministry is advancing the great commission.

videos.title: Genesis of Hope Documentary
videos.description: Genesis of Hope is a ministry dedicated to taking action against the rising poverty crisis in India by establishing “Hope” children centers around the country.  These centers provide essential education and skill training to children who otherwise wouldn’t have access to learning opportunities, helping children realize their potential and God given purpose. Within these dark and often hostile environments, Genesis of Hope brings the light of the Gospel of Jesus Christ into these communities.  I had the opportunity to work closely with Genesis of Hope and create this documentary to show the work the Lord is doing in and through this ministry.

videos.title: Conner and Abigail Haines - Wedding Video
videos.description: I had the blessing of capturing Conner and Abigail’s wedding in Tampa Florida.  This was my second wedding video, and I felt honored to document their story of faith and love. My goal was to weave together gentle praise, genuine emotion, and natural storytelling—reflecting the grace and joy of a couple rooted in Christ and united with a shared vision for ministry together, both here and abroad under God’s guidance.

videos.title: Jake and Danielle Holcroft - Wedding Video
videos.description: I had the honor of independently filming and editing my very first wedding video for The Holcrofts, cinematically capturing the love and sacred moments of their special day. From the heartfelt vows to the vibrant celebration at the reception, this video beautifully captures the personal and redemptive story of how God brought Jake and Danielle together. As my first wedding project, this experience marked a significant milestone in my growth as a videographer, and I’m proud to have created a timeless keepsake for The Holcrofts to cherish for a lifetime.

videos.title: Streets of India and COI
videos.description: T﻿hrough the partnership of Streets of India non-profit (located in Spain) and Cooperative Outreach of India, this education center was birthed to provide hope, light and opportunities to the children of India.  I was given the opportunity to create and speak in this video, sharing the impact this project from Streets of India has had on this community, with a call to action on how more support can help deepen the impact of this project and reach more children.

videos.title: Stories of Hope - LifeHouse Church
videos.description: I had the privilege of interviewing several women who have experienced God's hope in the midst of dark and challenging circumstances. I was honored to create videos sharing their powerful stories, which were presented during the Women's Hope of Christmas Conference at Lifehouse Church in Middletown DE.

videos.title: Love Initiative
videos.description: D﻿uring my time serving in India, I had the blessing of being part of the Love initiative, a regular, open mic event open for anyone in the area to join, which has a mission to grow relationships and strengthen community with the people in these cities, ultimately creating a open door to share the gospel. My main focus was to recap these event through videography, from flyer distribution to performances and lastly the biblical message

videos.title: Nirmal Sanskar Project
videos.description: A﻿s an initiative to fight the poverty that is prevalent all throughout India, the Nirmal Sanskar Project provides food and resources to the poor such as through feeding programs. I had the blessing to create this video documentary to share the impact, vision, and mission of the Nirmal Sanskar Project.

videos.title: The LÜM Project
videos.description: The LÜM Project is a mission to come alongside impoverished and exploited women in the villages of Guatemala, to make an impact to provides dignity, courage, empowerment and hope for the women, through providing them opportunities to use their talents of weaving as a way to generate income for their families. The LÜM Project opens the door to walk with these women spiritually, impacting generations for eternity.  While serving in Guatemala, I had the blessing of capturing this beautiful mission through the perspective of the women who have been impacted.

videos.title: House of Hope
videos.description: Located in Guatemala, House of Hope is an orphanage for young children that was started in the honor of Hope Mackenzie Herman, and now is a thriving ministry making a difference in the lives of  many children.  I had the blessing of serving with this ministry during my time in Guatemala, and one of the ways I could serve this ministry was sharing the story of House of Hope through this documentary.

videos.title: Finca Isabelle
videos.description: F﻿inca Isabelle is a beautiful farm land nestled in the mountains of Guatemala, that is dedicated to Isabelle Herman who passed away due to cancer.  I was given the opportunity to create this documentary to share the story and future vision to build a girls school on this finca land.
